post:
**[IOFLOOD.com](http://www.ioflood.com/)** is proud to be offering it's deepest discount **BLACKEST OF BLACK FRIDAY SPECIALS** on servers! 

This year's Black Friday special offers a **lifetime discount** on our high end servers with ridiculously low prices on dedicated unmetered 1gbps and 10gbps servers --- more than 50% off

Unmetered usage allows you to use one hundred percent of the maximum port speed 24/7 at one low flat rate. 1gbps servers are capable of 330tb / mo, while 10gbps servers can transfer an extraordinary 3,300tb / mo of data!

We expect these will sell out quickly, so wanted to make sure that customers like you get the opportunity to save the most money with us, but these offers are only available while stocks last!

**Two customizable servers to choose from:**

=============================================

**Black Friday Dual CPU Server**
Dual 10 Core Intel Xeon E5-2680v2 CPUs (20 total cores, 40 total threads)
64GB RAM
2x 480GB SSD or 2x 3TB Hitachi HDD
1Gbps Unmetered Bandwidth
/29 IPv4 allocation (5 usable IPs)
Remote IPMI / KVM over secured VPN
**$149 / mo only!**
**[https://manage.ioflood.com/order/?form_id=270](https://manage.ioflood.com/order/?form_id=270)**

**10gbps dedicated unmetered bandwidth just $500 more!**

**Black Friday Single CPU Server** 
Quad Core Intel Xeon E3-1230v2 CPU (4 cores, 8 threads)
16GB RAM
2x 256GB SSD or 2x 3TB Hitachi HDD
1Gbps Unmetered Bandwidth
/29 IPv4 allocation (5 usable IPs)
Remote IPMI / KVM over secured VPN
**$99 / mo only!**
**[https://manage.ioflood.com/order/?form_id=264](https://manage.ioflood.com/order/?form_id=264)**

**10gbps dedicated unmetered bandwidth just $500 more!**

=============================================

**Server Upgrades!**

Need a more powerful server to use all that bandwidth? 

No worries — upgrades are available!

**Available IP Allocations:**

* Additional /28 IP Addresses (13 useable IP’s)
* Additional /27 IP Addresses (29 useable IP’s)
* Additional /26 IP Addresses (61 useable IP’s)

**Available Hard Drives and SSDs:**

Intel 480GB Enterprise Sata SSD
Intel 1.6TB Enterprise Sata SSD
Intel 1.6TB Enterprise NVMe SSD
Samsung 3.84TB Enterprise NVMe SSD


3TB 7200rpm Hard Drive
10TB 7200rpm Hard Drive

**Ram Upgrades:**

*Single CPU Server: 32gb ram upgrade available

Dual CPU Server: 128gb and 256gb ram upgrades available

=============================================

The final price on your chosen configuration is good for as long as you have the server.

If you would like to customize any of these offers further, please do not hesitate to ask us: **sales [at] ioflood.com **

=============================================

_**What are customers like you saying about I/O FLOOD?**

=============================================

**Our feedback speaks for itself:**

[http://www.webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?t=1157469](http://www.webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?t=1157469)

Support is outstanding with Gabe, hes very friendly and has even helped me with things which are way outside of the providers support realm and I should have been charged for the additional support...We have expanded to around 19 services with him.

[http://www.webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?p=8740724](http://www.webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?p=8740724)

Their services are excellent, and raise the bar of what I've come to expect from unmanaged dedicated server providers. I upgraded hardware once, adding a SSD for performance reasons. The upgrade went very smoothly, Gabriel asked me when we should start, gave an estimate how long it'd take from then on, and how exactly the update would take place, and - well, that's exactly how it happened. No problems at all.

[http://mlpforums.com/topic/21625-welcome-to-the-new-server/](http://mlpforums.com/topic/21625-welcome-to-the-new-server/)

The company behind this awesome new server is I/O Flood. I want to take the time to give a special thanks to Gabe, who has been extremely helpful over the past couple of weeks in getting everything set up and ready to go for us in tip-top shape, offered me an amazing deal, and has gone above and beyond the level of service you'd normally expect from a hosting company.

=============================================

**Why Choose I/O Flood?**

=============================================

I/O FLOOD exists to help entrepreneurs start and grow successful small businesses. We do this by championing the use of the best tools for the job, by treating people fairly, and by providing high impact help. We just happen to rent servers.

See some of the benefits your hosting business can enjoy by hosting with I/O FLOOD:

* I/O FLOOD is run by **real systems administrators.** We love servers, and we love bandwidth. We promise to treat your server like it was our own.
* **No resellers, no middlemen, no nonsense.** We own our own servers and run our own network, and wouldn't have it any other way.
* **Unmanaged doesn't have to mean unhelpful.** Our experts are happy to assist you with the occasional problem or special request.
* Your satisfaction is guaranteed. If you're not happy, we'll give you a full refund, no questions asked.

=============================================
